Package kulami.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompPlayerAdapter
    The CompPlayerAdapter interface is implemented by classes that want to be notified when a CompPlayer has chosen its next move.
    GameObservable
    The GameObservable interface defines the methods that the Game class must implement for GameObservers.
    GameObserver
    Classes that want to be notified of game state changes have to implement this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    The class Game represents the current state of a Kulami game.
